item.description: Formula Derivation # The derivative approximation: $$ \begin{aligned} f(t_i, u_i) &= \frac{dy}{dt} \Big|{t_i} \approx \frac{y(t{i+1}) - y(t_{i-1})}{2\Delta t} + \mathcal{O}(\Delta t^2) \end{aligned} $$ Update formula: $$ \begin{aligned} u_{i+1} &= u_{i-1} + 2\Delta t f(t_i, u_i) \end{aligned} $$ Initial Conditions # Initial Condition Calculation: Given $y_0$ $$ \begin{aligned} u_2 &= y_0 + 2\Delta t f(t_1, u_1) \end{aligned} $$ Predictor-Corrector Steps: $$ \begin{aligned} u_1^* &= y_0 + \Delta t f(t_0, y_0), \ u_1 &= y_0 + \frac{\Delta t}{2} (f(t_0, y_0) + f(t_1, u_1^*)) \end{aligned} $$
